type.name: T:Elysium.Parameters.ComboBox
type.summary: Represents a class, which manages the settings of the control .

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.ComboBox.ButtonSize
property.summary: Gets or sets the width of the button in the control .
property.value: The width of the button in the control . The default value is 18px.
property.remarks:
Identifier field
Metadata
The value of this property is used only when the control is declared as "editable". Otherwise, the value is ignored and the button is stretched for the whole width of the control.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.ComboBox.GetButtonSize(System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.returns: The width of the button in the control .
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.
method.ensures: The being returned value is positive.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.ComboBox.SetButtonSize(System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox,System.Double)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
The width of the button in the control .
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.ComboBox.ArrowMargin
property.summary: Gets or sets the margin of the arrow from the sides of the button in the control.
property.value: the margin of the arrow from the sides of the button in the control. The default value is (5,0,5,0).
property.remarks:
Identifier field
Metadata
In the default style only the value of the right margin is used, all other values are ignored. Nevertheless, you can use the values of the other margins when you redefine the style.
